    "name": "Final term in the rows of triangle A130454: a(n) = A130454(n,(n+1)(n+2)/2 - 1).",
    "comment": [
        "Row n of triangle A130454 has (n+1)(n+2)/2 terms, where row n+1 is generated by taking partial sums of row n and then appending n+1 zeros followed by the final term in the partial sums of row n for n>=0."
    ],
